name: Hidden treasures
description:
The first collector of this NFT will receive this original painting.
1st collector, please DM me via Twitter @Maks_Denysenko & I'll send it to you!

Hidden treasures
One day my grandmother gave me a linen canvas, she liked my work and wanted to help in some way.
The primer became a varnish in tens layers, after drying the canvas tightens, dries. Then the most interesting thing began: the paint of all possible colors was used, the texture was formed from them, which is picked up at the sharpest angle by magenta and white fluorescent sprays.

Artwork created by Maksym Denysenko in 2015, 95.5x70.5 cm, spray paint on canvas, 3283x2390 pix.
